thread.title: Grandma and Grandpa Star In Hilarious Local Ad Blooper Reel

author: Reshareworthy Editorial Team
title: Grandma and Grandpa Star In Hilarious Local Ad Blooper Reel
text:
Grandma and Grandpa Star In Hilarious Local Ad Blooper Reel   
Try saying “baked in a buttery flaky crust” too many times and you’re bound to get tongue tied. That’s what happened to John Palmer, when he and his wife, Sonja, were filming an ad for Dysart’s Restaurant in Bangor, Maine. 
The longtime customers, who have been married for 53 years, began flubbing their lines and soon everyone is in stitches. You’ll have a hard time stopping laughing too when you watch their blooper reel! 
Share their hilarious outtakes with your friends and family!   Like Us On Facebook!
